Perceptor:

"THEN TAKE THIS!!!!!" said the male, who barely could avoid her 
tail, and opned fire against her



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The "witch" tried to go up and avoided the first missile, but the 
> second exploded near her tail. She rapidly transformed to wyvern 
mode 
> and plainly landed on top of Perceptor. She started battering him 
> with her musclular tail.
> 
> Dread: Yes! I am a witch! I am the witch! The Witch-Queen!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > Perceptor pop up  and varely avoided the shots "PREDACON; witch, 
> > PREDACOn!!!!"
> > 
> > He transformed to his behicle mode and shot 2 missiles to 
DeadPlague
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Dreadplague was in the sky, hovering in her helicopter mode. 
> > > Detecting Perceptor, she hurled two fireballs at him.
> > > 
> > > Dread: Die, Predagoon!
